formatDescription: WordPerfect is a Word Processing application currently owned by Corel Corporation. WordPerfect macro files have extensions wpm and wcm, and are a family of macro file formats used by Wordperfect and other Corel Products.
provenanceCompoundName: National Archives of Australia / National Archives of Australia
formatProvenance: 08/2023 (v.113)- Priority added over x-fmt/393 (WordPerfect for MS-DOS Document 5.0). Researched internally.

internalSignatures.name: WordPerfect Macro File - wpm extension
internalSignatures.note: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: ÿWPC{4}..

internalSignatures.name: WordPerfect Macro File - wcm extension
internalSignatures.note: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: ÿWPC{4}..{0-4000}(wcm|WCM)*(a|A)pplication{0-15}(d|D}efault
